name: Catalonia Institute of Construction Technology
goal: The Foundation Catalonia Institute of Construction Technology - ITeC, is an independent non-profit-making organisation that carries out its work in the area of operations intended to further the progress of construction.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Somos participantes activos de EOTA (European Organisation of Technical Assesment), en relación a la certificación de productos para la Construcción.
